name: CMIOExtensionPropertyAttributes
desc: An object that describes the attributes of a property.

items.name: init(minValue: ObjectType?, maxValue: ObjectType?, validValues: [ObjectType]?, readOnly: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a property attributes object with the specified configuration.

items.name: var isReadOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a property is read-only.

items.name: var minValue: ObjectType?
items.desc: The minimum value a property supports.

items.name: var maxValue: ObjectType?
items.desc: The maximum value a property supports.

items.name: var validValues: [ObjectType]?
items.desc: An array of discrete values that this property supports.

items.name: class var readOnlyPropertyAttribute: CMIOExtensionPropertyAttributes<AnyObject>
items.desc: A class property for a read-only property attribute.
